caption.p: Distribution of ASV sizes (sequence proportions). ASVs were categorized based on (A) the number of sample groups (3 decay classes Ã— 3 DNA types) and (C) the sets of DNA types (extracellular and intracellular DNA fraction, total DNA pool), in which they were detected. (B) Set definitions of DNA fractions, in which ASVs can be detected. These definitions are applied in panel (C) and in the text.
